name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh, Ren?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, what's wrong?"

name: 蓮
message: "I don't know. I just got the sudden urge to do this."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haha, what?"
I laugh a little and rest my head on Ren's shoulder.
I can feel his heat... and all of a sudden, a loneliness wells up inside me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're separate from me now, but this is still the only place I can see you in human form."

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It makes me kinda sad."

name: 蓮
message: "I'll still be with you as an Allmate, like always. Nothing's really going to change."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And I'm happy about that... but... um..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's not that I don't like the Allmate version of you..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But it makes me kinda sad that we can't, y'know, be together like this in the real world, I guess..."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Never mind. I'm being weird."
I quickly pull away.
I knew when I accepted Ren that this was how it would be. It's crazy to wish for something different now.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, I guess it's about time for us to―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "R-Ren?!"
Before I can finish, Ren pulls me back.
His arms squeeze so tightly it hurts. His breath is hot against my ear.

name: 蓮
message: "...I don't want to go back."

name: 蓮
message: "I want to be with you too. Like this."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."

name: 蓮
message: "I know I shouldn't be saying this..."

name: 蓮
message: "But I want to... touch you more. That's how I feel."
His words surprise me, but they also make me happy.
I never thought I'd hear him say anything like that...
Ren means everything to me. I want to show him how I feel.
I hug him back and press my cheek to his chest.
